title: Banana Arena - Catalyst Fund 15 Formal Proposal
summary:
Cultural and Aesthetic Disconnect
The Web3 gaming landscape is dominated by low-depth P2E loops, poor asset quality, and unsustainable hype cycles.
Cardano facesecosystem-level gaps
solution: Banana Arena is a high-speed Web3 competitive card game built on a deterministic Rust/WASM engine and a complete ADA→NP on-chain economic loop.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Losses Don: Product & Engineering Lead

Role: Lead Developer, Product Architect

Experience & Background:



Full-stack engineer with a background in Cognitive Neuroscience

Master of Brain Science, Beijing Normal University (BNU)

Minority Blue Label Certified Author

Former Technical Director at JBCZ, leading system architecture and engineering teams

Expert in Rust, WASM, deterministic game engines, and product framework design

5+ years building high-performance Web applications and real-time gameplay systems

Primary Responsibilities in This Project:



Core gameplay engine development (Rust → WASM)

Deterministic state machine architecture

Frontend/CLI terminal experience (CRT style)

Technical roadmap, quality control, and engineering delivery

Links:

GitHub: [https://github\.com/Losses](https://github.com/Losses)



Gary: Commercial Strategy & Blockchain Lead

Role: Blockchain Engineer, Economy Architect

Experience & Background:



Specialist in on-chain architecture, Tokenomics, and Web3 economic systems

1st Place – ETHShenzhen Hackathon 2025

Core contributor to Vyper-CN and HackQuest technical communities

Researcher of UTXO-based economic design, decentralized governance, and micro-transaction game economies

Student at Shenzhen University with focus on blockchain systems

Primary Responsibilities in This Project:



Aiken/Plutus contract development

ADA → NP economy pipeline & staking/settlement system

Game economy design and balancing

Mainnet integration, audits, and security processes

Community strategy & technical communications

Links:

 GitHub: [https://github\.com/Wenbobobo](https://github.com/Wenbobobo)

 Telegram: [https://t\.me/CC\_GG\_VV](https://t.me/CC_GG_VV)

 X/Twitter: [https://x\.com/Gary\_6\_6\_](https://x.com/Gary_6_6_)

sub_fields.title: Describe any dependencies or write 'No dependencies'
sub_fields.description: Here you should list any dependencies and prerequisites for your project's success. These are usually external factors (such as third-party suppliers, external resources, third-party software, etc.) that may cause a delay, since a project has less control over them. In case of third party software, indicate whether you have the necessary licenses and permission to use such software.
sub_fields.answer: Cardano node, CIP-30 wallet standards, and standard SDKs are sufficient.

sub_fields.title: Project Open Source
sub_fields.description: Will your project's output be fully open source? Open source refers to something people can modify and share because its design is publicly accessible.

sub_fields.title: Please provide details on the intellectual property (IP) status of your project outputs, including whether they will be released as open source or retained under another licence.
sub_fields.description: Please provide details on the intellectual property (IP) status of your project outputs, including whether they will be released as open source or retained under another licence.
sub_fields.answer:
Partially.
Open-source plan:

Open source:
Core game logic SDK (NANA ENGINE)
Wallet connection module (CIP-30 integration layer)
Test suite + deterministic logic framework
Closed source / proprietary:
Full game content (art, narrative, card assets)
Balance formulas and combat design
Anti-cheat and matchmaking systems

sub_fields.answer:
Prototype / MVP Demonstration

MVP Will Include:



Fully playable Web card game

Rust→WASM deterministic combat engine

3 core classes (Engineer / Apple Enthusiast / Tech Fanatic)

200+ cards, skills, and pixel-style assets

CIP-30 wallet connection (Nami, Lace, etc.)

ADA→NP mainnet conversion + staking + match settlement

On-chain event logging

Public mainnet MVP URL

Delivery Format:

 Web browser (Desktop first; Terminal/CLI optional)



User Experience:

 Connect wallet → convert ADA to NP → join matches → win NP from opponents → view on-chain settlements.

Success Metrics

On-Chain Metrics

≥ 99% ADA→NP conversion success

User Metrics



≥ 1,000 DAU during public test

Developer Ecosystem Metrics



NANA ENGINE SDK adopted by ≥ 2 external teams in follow-up cycle

≥ 1 open-source template for deterministic game logic published

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Solution – How we solve the issue (5–7 steps)

Build a deterministic Rust/WASM game engine for high-performance browser gameplay.

Integrate CIP-30 wallets and deploy NP staking/settlement contracts on mainnet.

Develop a culturally resonant card system with deep, non-symmetric strategies.

Implement a micro-transaction loop using Cardano UTXO for predictable economics.

Conduct structured closed tests with 200+ players to refine balance and UX.

Launch a mainnet-ready MVP accessible via browser with real ADA flows.

Open-source reusable modules (engine + wallet SDK) for future Cardano game builders.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Impact on Cardano Ecosystem

Creates a high-quality, fully playable on-chain game for real mainnet usage.

Drives consistent microtransaction volume, increasing network activity.

Provides reusable SDK modules for future Cardano game developers.

Strengthens Cardano’s meme, culture, and creator identity.

Onboards new users via an enjoyable, non-speculative product.

Demonstrates high-performance Web3 game architecture for future integrators.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
ASM deterministic engine

Event-sourcing combat architecture

Aiken/Plutus contracts for NP economy

CIP-30 wallet interface

Web-hosted MVP with CDN + API servicesWhy Cardano

Cardano provides the ideal architecture for high-frequency game economies:

UTxO determinism → perfect for predictable, reproducible microtransactions

Low fees → feasible for rapid ADA→NP→settlement loops

CIP-30 browser wallets → instant frictionless onboarding

Strong developer culture → perfect match for Banana Arena’s theme

Banana Arena is not merely compatible with Cardano, it is Cardano-native by design.

sub_fields.title: Project Milestones
sub_fields.description: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?

sub_fields.title: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?
sub_fields.description: The number of milestones required depends on the amount of funding requested. Please refer to the Guidance card on the right for details

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 1 — Core Engine Architecture

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
•	Key Activities:

o	Architecture Refactoring: Refactor the existing GameMaster codebase based on Event-Sourcing architecture, stripping redundant modules to ensure clean underlying logic.

o	State Machine Development: Implement a pure functional combat state machine (Rust), ensuring that determined input leads to determined output, laying the foundation for subsequent on-chain verification.

o	Numerical Logic Implementation: Implement code for the flow, deduction, and chain reactions of the "Money/Energy/Health" three-dimensional values.

o	Web Flow Setup: Implement frontend effects based on Rust + WASM, establishing visual standards for the retro CRT terminal style (fonts, color values, scan line effects).

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
•	Deliverables:

o	GitHub Repository Update: Contains the refactored core engine code.

o	Completion of the flow logic for three-dimensional values (Money/Energy/Health) passing interaction tests.

o	Completion and display of initial UI design.

o	Smooth running Local Single-player Demo (Runnable Codebase), providing CLI or Web version running guides and demo videos.

o	Value: The game's core logic is runnable and tested, providing a stable kernel for subsequent class and economic systems.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
•	Deliverables:

o	GitHub Repository Update: Contains the refactored core engine code.

o	Completion of the flow logic for three-dimensional values (Money/Energy/Health) passing interaction tests.

o	Completion and display of initial UI design.

o	Smooth running Local Single-player Demo (Runnable Codebase), providing CLI or Web version running guides and demo videos.

o	Value: The game's core logic is runnable and tested, providing a stable kernel for subsequent class and economic systems.

sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 2 — Content & Balancing

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
(2)	Content, Character System + Initial Balance

•	Key Activities:

o	Character Expansion: Complete design and implementation of 7+ differentiated characters (Middle-aged Engineer, Apple Fanboy, Tech Zealot, etc.), coding their exclusive passive skills.

o	Card Pool Expansion: Complete numerical design for 200+ core cards and create corresponding pixel-style card art.

o	Data Analysis: Analyze early card numerical settings, design card efficacy formulas to ensure balance.

o	Structured Closed Beta Preparation: Formulate a closed beta plan, design user feedback questionnaires, and deep interview outlines.

o	Functional Prototype Development: Develop basic logic for the Bank System module and prototype for the mission system.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
•	Deliverables:

o	Increase to more than seven selectable characters.

o	Implement a complete, differentiated Character Skill system.

o	Produce character skill lists and a card compendium.

o	Complete 200+ Card designs.

o	Screenshots or interactive videos of the Bank System interface.

o	Value: Game strategy depth possesses playability, enabling small-scale internal testing.

sub_fields.answer: Milestone 3 — UI Finalization & Mainnet Integration

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
•	Key Activities:

o	UI/UX Optimization: Achieve perfect retro terminal interaction and a full-process gameplay experience.

o	Economic Function Implementation: Develop the exchange function for Testnet ADA ↔ NP, and the minting logic for "Early Tester" NFT badges.

o	Contract Development: Write and deploy contracts for NP token recharge, locking, and settlement.

o	Mainnet Wallet Integration: Integrate CIP-30 standards, supporting connection and signing for mainstream wallets like Lace, Nami, etc.

o	Full-link Stress Testing: Simulate high-concurrency scenarios, testing the latency and stability of on-chain state synchronization services.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
•	Deliverables:

o	Screenshots or interaction videos of the UI system interface.

o	Deploy and complete full-process Stress Testing.

o	Mainnet Cardano Wallet Integration (CIP-30).

o	Implement Mainnet ADA→NP Exchange Process.

o	Deploy Mainnet NP recharge, locking, and settlement contracts.

Value: Completion of the closed-loop verification from game to chain, preparing for Mainnet launch.

o	Implement Mainnet ADA→NP Exchange Process.

o	Deploy Mainnet NP recharge, locking, and settlement contracts.

Value: Completion of the closed-loop verification from game to chain, preparing for Mainnet launch.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 4 — Mainnet Launch & Public Test

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
•	Key Activities:

o	Mainnet Deployment Testing: Formal deployment to the Cardano Mainnet environment for continuous testing.

o	Player Testing: Launch "Invite-only" public beta, redeeming invite codes via NP, with a total of 200+ players participating in the test.

o	Bug Fixes & Optimization: Fix bugs based on player feedback, optimize numerical designs.

o	Feedback Collection: Collect feedback questionnaires from the first batch of 200+ players, planning directions for future version iterations.

o	User Growth Activities: Hold community Card Meme creation contests, online AMAs, and other pre-heat activities.

•	Key Activities:

o	Mainnet Deployment Testing: Formal deployment to the Cardano Mainnet environment for continuous testing.

o	Player Testing: Launch "Invite-only" public beta, redeeming invite codes via NP, with a total of 200+ players participating in the test.

o	Bug Fixes & Optimization: Fix bugs based on player feedback, optimize numerical designs.

o	Feedback Collection: Collect feedback questionnaires from the first batch of 200+ players, planning directions for future version iterations.

o	User Growth Activities: Hold community Card Meme creation contests, online AMAs, and other pre-heat activities.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
Deliverables:

Mainnet MVP Product: Banana Arena Mainnet officially launches public beta (Accessible URL).

User real feedback data, writing a complete Test Report.

Publish Announcements + Product Documentation / Whitepaper.

Publicize verifiable records of all on-chain transactions.

50+ Community Spontaneous Content (Memes / Videos / Guides).

Final Report: A final report containing a summary of public beta data and the future roadmap.

Value:

Mainnet Real Users → Provide real usage scenarios and economic value to Cardano.

Sustainable Model Replication → Provide a high-quality Web 3 game template for the ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
Value for Money

High-impact mainnet utility at relatively low cost.

Delivers open-source SDK modules for future Cardano games.

Creates sustainable, meme-driven community engagement.

Demonstrates a top-tier technical architecture combining Rust, WASM, and Cardano UTXO.

Directly increases on-chain activity through microtransactions, staking, and settlement.

Banana Arena provides both short-term mainnet value and long-term reusable infrastructure for the entire Cardano GameFi ecosystem.
